body:
SO, I am just wondering how many of the avicus community watch anime so here are my question:

1. Do you watch anime?
2. If so which one/s?
3. What is your favourite character?

THANKS!!!!!!!!!!
body_tagged:

title: Anime!!!

replies.body:
1. Yes.
2. Mainly Action, Romance, Comedy and horror (I don't mind little bit of Ecchi).
3. Morgiana from Magi: The Labyrinth of Magic OR King from The Seven Deadly Sins.
